Marwan Hamed (amụrụ n'afọ 1977) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Egypt na-eto eto. Ọ bụ nwa onye edemede Wahid Hamed na onye nta akụkọ Zeinab Sweidan
Ihe nkiri mbụ ya bụ ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi akpọrọ Li Li
Nke sochiri ya bu ihe nkiri dị mkpa akpọrọ The Yacoubian Building nke dabeere na akwụkwọ akụkọ Alaa Al Aswany na Adel Emam.
O sonyere na ntụziaka nke usoro Lahzat Harija ma mepụta vidiyo egwu maka Amr Diab.
Ibrahim Labyad nke Ahmed El-Sakka na Hend Sabry sochiri Yacoubian Building nke e wepụtara na 2009
Mgbe ahụ, ọ wepụtara The Blue Elephant nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri Karim Abdel Aziz na Khaled Al Sawy, ma dabere na akwụkwọ akụkọ Ahmed Mourad nke otu aha ahụ
Ihe nkiri ikpeazụ ọ wepụtara bụ The Originals na-amalite Khaled el Sawy, Maged el Kedwany na Menna Shalby
